DOCNAME: CASE OF HOVHANNISYAN AND SHIROYAN v. ARMENIA
CONCLUSION: Reminder inadmissible;Violation of P1-1;Just satisfaction reserved
JUDGES: Alvina Gyulumyan;Elisabet Fura;Ineta Ziemele;Josep Casadevall;Luis López Guerra
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE , DATE and DATE respectively and live in GPE .

CARDINAL . According to the applicants , they enjoyed a right of use of accommodation in respect of QUANTITY . m of a flat which in total measured QUANTITY m. and was situated at CARDINAL FAC , GPE . It appears that the flat was owned by their family member , GPE The Government contested this allegation and claimed that only the applicants PERSON and PERSON ( “ the first applicant ” and “ the second applicant ” ) enjoyed such a right , while the applicant ORG ( “ the third applicant ” ) , who was a minor , was only entitled to live in the flat in question .

CARDINAL . On DATE the Government adopted Decree no . PERSON , approving the expropriation zones of the immovable property ( plots of land , buildings and constructions ) situated within the administrative boundaries of LOC of GPE to be taken for the needs of the State for the purpose of carrying out construction projects , covering a total area of QUANTITY m. FAC was listed as one of the streets falling within such expropriation zones .
CARDINAL . On DATE the Government decided to contract out the construction of CARDINAL of the sections of FAC DATE which was to be renamed FAC – to a private company , ORG

CARDINAL . On DATE PERSON and ORG signed an agreement which , inter alia , authorised the former to negotiate directly with the owners of the property subject to expropriation and , should such negotiations fail , to institute court proceedings on behalf of the ORG , seeking forced expropriation of such property .

CARDINAL . By a letter of CARDINAL DATE PERSON informed the first and second applicants that the flat in question was situated within the expropriation zone of the FAC area and was to be taken for ORG needs . Each applicant was offered a total of the NORP dram ( ORG ) equivalent of MONEY ( ORG ) as financial assistance , pursuant to paragraphs CARDINAL(c ) and CARDINAL ) of the compensation procedure approved by Government Decree no . CARDINAL of DATE ( see paragraphs CARDINAL and CARDINAL below ; hereafter , “ the compensation procedure ” ) .
CARDINAL . It appears that the first and second applicants did not accept this offer .

CARDINAL . On an unspecified date , ORG instituted proceedings against the first and second applicants on behalf of the ORG , seeking to terminate their right of use through payment of financial assistance and to evict all the applicants with reference to , inter alia , Articles CARDINAL and CARDINAL of LAW . The plaintiff claimed that persons enjoying a right of use were entitled , pursuant to paragraph CARDINAL of the compensation procedure , to receive assistance in the NORP dram equivalent of FAC .

CARDINAL . It appears that in the course of the court proceedings ORG offered the same amount of compensation also to the third applicant , since she was also registered at the flat in question . The third applicant joined the proceedings as a co - defendant .

CARDINAL . On DATE a contract was signed between ORG and the owner of the flat , GPE , according to which she agreed to cede the flat to the ORG in exchange for another flat . It appears that CARDINAL other persons who also enjoyed a right of use in respect of the same flat accepted the price offers made to them and gave up their rights .

CARDINAL . On DATE the GPE and ORG of GPE ( Երևան քաղաքի Կենտրոն և Նորք-Մարաշ համայնքների աոաջին ատյանի դատարան ) granted the claim of ORG , terminating the applicants ' right of use and awarding them a total of the NORP dram equivalent of CARDINAL as compensation . In doing so , the court referred to LAW and CARDINAL and LAW , as well as paragraph CARDINAL of the compensation procedure .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicants lodged an appeal .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( ՀՀ քաղաքացիական գործերով վերաքննիչ դատարան ) granted the claim of ORG on the same grounds as FAC .
CARDINAL . On DATE another contract was signed between ORG and the owner of the flat , GPE , similar to that of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicants lodged an appeal on points of law which they supplemented on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG 's ownership in respect of the flat was formally registered on the basis of the contract of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( ՀՀ վճռաբեկ դատարան ) dismissed the applicants ' appeal .
CARDINAL . For a summary of the relevant domestic provisions see the judgment in the case of PERSON and PERSON v. GPE ( no . GPE , § § CARDINAL and CARDINAL , DATE ) .

CARDINAL . According to LAW , the right of ownership and other property rights in respect of immovable property , their limitations , origin , transfer and termination are subject to ORG registration .

CARDINAL . According to Article CARDINAL , in cases when a right in respect of property is subject to State registration , the acquirer 's right of ownership arises from the moment of such registration .

CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL § § CARDINAL and CARDINAL provided that a plot of land might be taken from the owner for the needs of the ORG or the community by compensating its value . Depending on for whose needs a plot of land was to be taken , its value was to be compensated by either the ORG or the community . The decision to take a plot of land for the needs of the ORG or the community was to be taken by a public authority .

CARDINAL . Article QUANTITY § CARDINAL provided that , if no agreement could be reached with the owner of the plot of land to be taken for ORG needs concerning the amount or other conditions of compensation , the relevant public authority might institute court proceedings seeking to take the plot of land .

CARDINAL . According to paragraph CARDINAL(c ) of the compensation procedure , persons and their minor children DATE who were registered , including in unauthorised constructions , prior to the date on which State registration was made ( DATE ) on the basis of the competent public authority 's decision to take the plot of land for the needs of the ORG – shall each receive assistance in the amount of the NORP dram equivalent of MONEY , based on the document confirming the fact of registration ( passport , birth certificate or a certificate provided by the competent authority in charge of the registration ) .

CARDINAL . According to paragraph CARDINAL ) of the compensation procedure , persons mentioned in LAW ) of this Procedure shall receive assistance in the amount of the NORP dram equivalent of CARDINAL .

CARDINAL . According to paragraph CARDINAL of the compensation procedure , persons who have acquired a right of use or of lease in accordance with the procedure prescribed by law in respect of a plot of land situated in an expropriation zone shall receive as compensation the assessed value of the right of use or of lease of the given plot of land .
